Deposit Withdrawal Network Copy Balance assets： Minimum withdrawal amount Address Withdrawal address Enter your withdrawal address Total Transaction Fee： ● Important! Wallets of different currencies are incompatible. Please confirm the compatibility between the wallet address and the currency to avoid loss. ● The trade will be completed after %d confirmations. ● If the deposit quantity is small, low service charges will extend the in-chain time of block chain and the entry time. ● After the operation is completed, the information will be displayed in the recent deposit record and the history of wallet.
Amount ● Important! Please confirm that the wallet address is %s. If the wallet address does not match, the lost virtual currency cannot be taken back. ● Service charge for single withdrawal, in %s. ● Maximum withdrawal amount per day, in %s. ● The service charge will be deducted from the withdrawal amount. ● The system will send %s to the designated wallet address in %d hours. Login password Password change will require re-login Withdrawal address Address management can record your information on withdrawal address. Upgrade Level 2 Level 1 Level 2 Verification completed Not verified yet Upgrade Level 2 now for higher security and experience the complete functions! ✓ Open market trade, wallet deposit and withdrawal. \n✓ Monitoring account security. Disable immediately upon suspicious condition. \n✓ Delete old device to greatly improve the security. Later Upgrade
Disable account Are you sure you want to disable account\? Once your account is forbidden, at least 2 hours is required to start the re-activation. The password will be reset ．Locked for 2 hours ．All trusted devices have been deleted. ．All withdrawals to be handled will be cancelled. ．All the existing orders have been cancelled. ．Log out from all devices now.

On-site notifications Once enabled, you will receive relevant notifications within the app and website. System messages System update, major system messages Device Activities Notification upon successful new device authentication Login Activities Notification upon new IP address log-in Deposit & Withdrawal Notification Notification upon successful (failed) deposit or withdrawal Trade Notification Notification upon successful trade buy-in and sell-out
Email Push Once enabled, you will receive relevant notifications within the email.

My ads Post new ad Post Insufficient permission insufficient permission, cannot post new ad Meet the following conditions to post new ad Completed C2C orders ≧ %1$s Registered ≧ %1$s day(s) ago C2C orders deal rate in 30 days ≧ %1$s % edit ad post Price Payment method Counterparty Conditions Others Ad Type With Flat Price Type Fixed Floating Order Price Available amount Order Limit (min) Order Limit (max) Payment Time Limit • Highest Order Price %1$s %2$s • Lowest Order Price %1$s %2$s • Average Order Price %1$s %2$s Add refresh This Ad only shown to counterparties who match your conditions counterparty should register for counterparty should complete sell orders counterparty should complete buy orders counterparty\'s 30d complete rate Terms of the transaction Terms of the transaction (Optional) Terms will be displayed to counterparties day Orders % min hr Exceed maximum number (%d ) of character allowed Buy Sell Sell Buy Choose at least one payment method %1$d/%2$d payment methods enabled Account: %s Bank: %1$s \nAccount:%2$s Waiting Unpaid Paid Completed Cancelled User cancelled System cancelled Appealing All status All Buy Sell All C2C Orders Ongoing Appealing All If you have not received the payment, please do not release Confirm that payment has been received Confirm release %1$s%2$s Are you sure to cancel the order\? If the order has been paid, please do not cancel the order Confirm that the order has not been paid (%d:%02d:%02d left) Refresh time %s(GMT+8) I want to appeal : C2C order %s Buy %s Sell %s Order cancelled Order has cancelled, you can\'t view the payment methods Chat Room Order No Please Enter Order No Create Time Total Price Price/Quantity Counterparty Status Take Order Details Mark as Paid Confirm Release Appeal View Tickets Cancel Price Quantity Terms Payment Method Detail Payment Method Detail refresh Cancel You can check the payment method after the counterparty takes the order The seller may need you to provide more information to decide whether to take the order or not, please go to the chat room for further communication Order Cancelled Order Completed To be released Please wait for the seller to confirm The buyer has paid, please confirm the payment, click \"Release\", if the amount is correct, or confirm with the buyer if there is a problem with the payment, Please pay within the time limit, or the order will be automatically cancelled \nIf you have paid, please click \"Mark Paid\" to inform the seller Payment to be made by buyer Waiting The seller is confirming, Please wait Please take the order within time limit, otherwise the order will be cancelled Please do NOT pay before counterparty takes the order Please take the order as soon as possible, so the counterparty can see your payment method Check C2C Wallet Post This ad will be displayed on of C2C transactions Price Quantity Order Limit -
